title: Scheduler Function Block
description: This function block schedules output signals based on input events and specified time intervals. The block monitors time elapsed since specific events represented by E0, E1, E2, and E3, and activates corresponding outputs Q0, Q1, Q2, and Q3 when the specified time conditions are met.
name: SCHEDULER

input.name: E0
input.description: Input event signal for output Q0.

input.name: E1
input.description: Input event signal for output Q1.

input.name: E2
input.description: Input event signal for output Q2.

input.name: E3
input.description: Input event signal for output Q3.

input.name: T0
input.description: The time interval for activating output Q0.

input.name: T1
input.description: The time interval for activating output Q1.

input.name: T2
input.description: The time interval for activating output Q2.

input.name: T3
input.description: The time interval for activating output Q3.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output signal indicating the status of E0 after T0 has elapsed.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output signal indicating the status of E1 after T1 has elapsed.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output signal indicating the status of E2 after T2 has elapsed.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output signal indicating the status of E3 after T3 has elapsed.
